contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|pad|PAD}} '''Pad''' or '''PAD''' may refer to: * [[Writing pad (disambiguation)]], a book of paper, or an electronic equivalent * [[Sanitary pad]], a device worn by a woman during menstruation * [[Pad (music)]], a type of synthesized sound * Part of a mammal's [[paw]] {{TOCright}} == Transportation == * [[Launch pad]], an area where spacecraft lifts off * [[Helicopter landing pad]] * [[London Paddington station]], station code PAD * [[Paderborn Lippstadt Airport]], IATA code PAD == Sports gear == * [[Pads]], specialized equipment used in baseball, cricket, and hockey * [[Elbow pads]] * [[Knee pads]] * [[Shoulder pads]] == Computing and electronics == * [[Touchpad]] * [[ThinkPad]], a laptop brand first designed and produced by IBM, but now owned by Lenovo * [[iPad]], a tablet computer from Apple Inc. * [[Graphics pad]], a computer input device * [[Control pad]], a type of game controller * [[Trigger pad]], an electronic sensor on a drum * [[Packet Assembler/Disassembler]], a communications device * [[Portable Application Description]], a document format * PAD, a control character in the [[C0 and C1 control codes|C1 control code set]] * Components of an [[attenuator (electronics)|attenuator]], an electronic device * [[Contact pad]]s, designated surface areas for electrical contacts * [[Pulsed Amperometric Detection]] == Science and medicine == * [[Peripheral vascular disease|Peripheral Arterial Disease]] * Peroral [[Anti-diabetic_medication|anti-diabetics]], a group of medications to treat [[diabetes mellitus]] * [[Phenylalanine deaminase Test]], a microbiological test == Other uses == *[[Pad, Roane County, West Virginia]] * [[PAD emotional state model]], a psychological model based on Pleasure, Arousal and Dominance * [[People's Alliance for Democracy]], a Thailand political group * [[People's Action for Development]], an Indian NGO * [[Peter Allen David]], American writer * [[Phi Alpha Delta]], a fraternity * [[Seabee_(US_Navy)#Obsolete_Unit_Types|Pontoon Assembly Detachment]] * [[Pre-Authorized Debit]] * [[Pre-Operative Autologous Donation]], when a patient's own blood is taken for possible use during surgery * [[Prithvi Air Defence]], a missile * [[Program-associated data]], a type of broadcast information * ''Pád'', the [Hungarian name for Spini village, [[Turdaș]] Commune, Hunedoara County, Romania * Part of the mantra ''[[Om mani padme hum]]'' * [[Drill floor]], also called a drilling pad or just a pad. ==See also== * [[Padding]] {{Disambiguation}}
